subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Rather than choosing between two consensus choices, Houston selected Carlos Correa, a 17-year-old, 6-foot-4 shortstop from Puerto Rico, as their top draft pick.
snippet: Rather than choosing between two consensus choices, Houston selected Carlos Correa, a 17-year-old, 6-foot-4 shortstop from Puerto Rico, as their top draft pick.
